title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
EB: The CVS repository view is no longermaximized.A view that is maximized should stay maximized.
SR: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective.2. Double click the title bar to maximize it3. Switch to the resource perspective.4. Come back to the Java perspective.
